law.text: In the course of its investigations and studies, the Commission may ascertain the amount on deposit in any bank belonging to the agency audited, and may audit the account on the books of the bank. No bank is liable for making available to the Commission any of the information required under this section.
law.history: Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 384, sec. 10, effective June 21, 1974. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 42, sec. 8, effective July 1, 1966.

metadata.lrc-note: This is former KRS 6.405 as amended, renumbered by the Reviser of Statutes in 1974.
